tit.j: 京都 宇治・洛南1dayチケット

sen.j: 京都 宇治・洛南1dayチケット（きょうと うじ・らくなんワンデイチケット）とは、大阪市交通局、京阪電気鉄道（京阪）、大阪府都市開発泉北高速鉄道線（泉北高速）、南海電気鉄道（南海）が共同で発売している乗り放題の電子カードと各種割引・特典が受けられるクーポン券をセットにした切符である。
sen.e: The "Kyoto Uji Rakunan One-Day Ticket" electronic card which allows unlimited rides, various discounts and coupons offering special benefits as part of the package is sold jointly by the: Osaka Municipal Transportation Bureau, Keihan Electric Railway (Keihan), Osaka Prefectural Urban Development Co., Ltd. Semboku Rapid Railway (Semboku Rapid Railway),Nankai Electric Railway (Nankai).

The "Kyoto Uji Rakunan One-Day Ticket" electronic card, which allows unlimited rides, various discounts and coupons offering special benefits as part of the package, is sold jointly by the Osaka Municipal Transportation Bureau, Keihan Electric Railway (Keihan), Osaka Prefectural Urban Development Co., Ltd., Semboku Rapid Railway (Semboku Rapid Railway) and Nankai Electric Railway (Nankai).

The "Kyoto Uji Rakunan One-Day Ticket" electronic card, which allows unlimited rides and comes with coupons offering various discounts and special benefits as part of the package, is sold jointly by the Osaka Municipal Transportation Bureau, Keihan Electric Railway (Keihan), Semboku Rapid Railway (Semboku Rapid) of Osaka Prefectural Urban Development Co., Ltd., and Nankai Electric Railway (Nankai).
sen.cmt: “→ " に修正しました。クーポンがセットになった、という意味を追加しました。大阪府都市開発泉北高速鉄道線（泉北高速）→Semboku Rapid Railway (Semboku Rapid) of Osaka Prefectural Urban Development Co., Ltd. としました。

sen.e: Outline
Outline
Summary
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 宇治市と洛南と呼ばれている京都市南部エリアの観光客誘致のために登場した。
sen.e: Created to attract visitors to the so called "Uji City Rakunan" Southern area of Kyoto City.
It was created as a means to attract visitors to the so-called "Uji City Rakunan" southern area of Kyoto City.
It was created as a means to attract visitors to Uji City as well as the "Rakunan" area, which is the southern area of Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: “→ " に修正しました。一部翻訳を変更しました。

sen.j: 毎年登場しているが、いつも期間限定である。
sen.e: It appears every year but always only for a limited period.
It appears for a limited period each year.
It appears for a limited period each year.

sen.j: 発売社と乗り放題エリア
sen.e: Vendor companies & unlimited ride areas.
Vendor companies and unlimited ride areas
Vendor companies and unlimited ride areas

sen.j: 南海は高野山駅、関西空港駅以外の駅で、泉北高速は全駅で発売されている。
sen.e: Sold at Nankai stations: other than Koyasan Station, Kansai-Airport Station and, all Semboku Rapid Railway stations.
It's sold at Nankai stations other than Koyasan Station, as well as Kansai-Airport Station and all Semboku Rapid Railway stations.
It's sold at Nankai stations other than Koyasan Station, as well as Kansai-airport Station and all Semboku Rapid Railway stations.
sen.cmt: Kansai-airport としました（JR おでかけネットより）。

sen.j: 乗り放題エリアは上記の発売駅に大阪市営地下鉄と大阪市交通局南港ポートタウン線の全線、京阪の京阪京津線と京阪石山坂本線、京阪鋼索線以外の全線。
sen.e: Areas where unlimited rides are allowed include the stations above where the card is sold. All lines of the Osaka Municipal Subway, Osaka Municipal Transportation Bureau Nanko Port Town Line. Keihan Railways all lines except for: Keihan Keishin Line, Keihan Ishiyamasakamoto Line and Keihan Kosaku Line.

Areas where unlimited rides are allowed include the stations above where the card is sold, including all lines of the Osaka Municipal Subway, Osaka Municipal Transportation Bureau Nanko Port Town Line; on Keihan Railways, unlimited rides are allowed on all lines except for the Keihan Keishin, Keihan Ishiyamasakamoto and Keihan Kosaku lines.

Areas where unlimited rides are allowed include the stations above where the card is sold, including all lines of the Osaka Municipal Subway, Osaka Municipal Transportation Bureau Nanko Port Town Line; on Keihan Railways, unlimited rides are allowed on all lines except for the Keihan Keishin, Keihan Ishiyama-sakamoto and Keihan Kosaku (cable) lines.
Valid Period
Valid Period
Valid period
sen.cmt: 小タイトルのため、小文字にしました。

sen.j: 2006年は4月29日から7月2日までで、その期間内の任意の一日に有効。
sen.e: Valid for one day during the period: April 29 to July 2, 2006.
Valid for one day during the period of April 29 to July 2, 2006
In 2006, it was valid for one day during the period of April 29 to July 2, 2006.

sen.j: 特典が受けられる施設
sen.e: Establishments offering special benefits:
Establishments offering special benefits:
Establishments offering special benefits
sen.cmt: コロンを削除しました。

sen.j: この切符についているクーポンを提示すると、以下の施設で各種割引・特典が受けられる。
sen.e: The ticket comes with coupons that offer a range of discounts and benefits at the following establishments:
The ticket comes with coupons that offer a range of discounts and benefits at the following establishments:
The ticket comes with coupons that offer a range of discounts and benefits at the following establishments:

Tsuen Tea Shop: Ten-percent discount on food and drinks as well as gift lines
